personalInfo.clubAffl: Pinehurst Resort and CC (Pinehurst, North Carolina)

tourBios.otherInfo: Will be playing his rookie season on the 2007 Nationwide Tour, having never started a Tour event. Missed cut at the 2006 B.C. Open at Turning Stone Resort represents his only career start on the PGA TOUR. Leading money-winner on the 2005 Tar Heel Tour, where he played from 2003-06. Also played on the Triangle Tour (2002) and the Carolinas Pro Golf Tour (2006). Third-team All-American during the 2000-01 Wolfpack season. Got his start in golf when he found a driver in the garage and a golf ball in the yard. Lists Tiger Woods, Seve Ballesteros and Steve Smith as his heroes. Cites being named an All-American during his senior year in college as his biggest thrill in golf. His dad is from Madrid, Spain, and his entire family is bilingual.
